article_title: Foreign minister confirms death of Canadian citizen.
sentence: Canada's  Foreign  Minister  Mélanie  Joly  says  she  is  "horrified"  to  hear  of  the  Israeli  airstrikes  that  killed  seven  World  Central  Kitchen  employees,  as  she  confirms  a  Canadian  citizen  was  among  the  dead.
